biotools.summary: An intelligent framework for RNA-seq analysis pipeline selection and benchmarking. RAPTOR profiles RNA-seq data characteristics (biological coefficient of variation, sequencing depth, library size distribution, sample size, zero-inflation patterns) and employs a multi-criteria scoring algorithm to recommend optimal pipelines from eight production-ready workflows. The framework also enables comprehensive benchmarking comparing all pipelines on user-specific data, quantifying accuracy, runtime, memory usage, and concordance.
